title: Account Management - Handle Client Complaint
description: A client's main contact calls the account manager to complain about repeated slow response times from the service desk.

tasks.description: Listen to the client's complaint, empathize with their frustration, and promise to investigate immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client feels heard and acknowledged.

tasks.description: Analyze the client's ticket data for the last 3 months, focusing on 'Time to Respond' and 'Time to Resolution' metrics.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data confirms that while response times are within SLA, they are slower than average.

tasks.description: Follow up with the client, acknowledging the findings and presenting a plan to improve performance, such as assigning a dedicated technician.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager takes ownership of the issue and presents a concrete solution, rebuilding trust with the client.
